title: eSports Club Stuttgart LF D3+ Top und Midlane f√ºr die 2. Division der ESL Meisterschaft
body:
eSports club Stuttgart (e Sports club based in Germany - Stuttgart) looking for a Mid Lane and Top Lane to compete in the ESL Meisterschaft 2nd Division.

Current team:

Team Manager: SeS Invisible

Coach: -

Top: - (Seguleh Zero) Open

Jungle: Gramunyy

Mid: (Seguleh Zero) Open

ADC: zødiåc

SUPP: Errorkiller

Requirements to join our team:

- at least D3 in EUW

- from Europe

- competitive champion pool

- the goal to join the first Division in the summer split

- at least 16 years old

- you need discord + mic

- fluent english / German preferably

- Top Laner or Mid laner


if you are interested add me ingame: SeS Invisible
